short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Decorate your new tabs with useful information and a beautiful background.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Prestige brings a beautiful picture to your browser every time you open a new tab. These immersive pictures have been hand curated to transport you to new places and make you pause and think. We all live in our browsers, who needs desktop wallpapers? Let Prestige bring your new tabs to life!
